result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel M Matticks was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Restitution has been paid in full.
Cash bail applied to DNA surcharge and Court costs - PAID IN FULL.  Balance of cash bail to be refunded to poster.
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling.

Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No contact with Pick N Save and Walmart stores listed in the Criminal Complaint (in this case and case 14CF1405).
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Case 14CF1405 is dismissed and read in.

timeConds.notes: Non-working hours (Huber) with all standard release conditions.  STAYED - to be used at Agent's discretion.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Daniel M Matticks in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant entered a plea of guilty to the charge. Court conducted plea colloquy with defendant.
Court finds defendant guilty. Court dismissed and read-in case 14CF1405.

The Defendant was sentenced to the following:

IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

9 MONTHS STRAIGT TIME;

TERM OF PROBATION:  18 MONTHS;

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  

*Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
*Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling 
*No contact with:  Pick N Save and Walmart stores listed in this Criminal Complaint and in case 14CF1405. 
*DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done.

RESTITUTION:  Paid in full

COURT COSTS:  $278.00 (includes $10.00 DRGOD surcharge) to be paid as a condition of probation;

DNA SURCHARGE:  $ 250.00 to be paid as a condition of progation; 

45 DAYS CONDITION TIME WITH HUBER; STAYED for use at agent's discretion. 

Felony warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.
